plugins.title: Commerce
plugins.paletteRect: top: 54px; left: 5px; bottom: 5px; width: 300px; height: calc(100% - 59px); border-radius: var(--hlx-sk-button-border-radius); overflow: hidden; resize: horizontal;

plugins.title: Banners
plugins.paletteRect: top: 54px; left: 5px; bottom: 5px; width: 90%; height: calc(100% - 59px); border-radius: var(--hlx-sk-button-border-radius); overflow: hidden; resize: horizontal;

plugins.title: AEM Assets Library
plugins.paletteRect: top: 50px; bottom: 10px; right: 10px; left: auto; width:400px; height: calc(100vh - 60px)

plugins.title: Promotion
plugins.paletteRect: top: 54px; left: 5px; bottom: 5px; width: 550px; height: calc(100% - 59px); border-radius: var(--hlx-sk-button-border-radius); overflow: hidden; resize: horizontal;
